amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the indirect medical education adjustment percentage under the Medicare program at 6.5 percent.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1004 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1004 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S8400-8401; text: CR S8400) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the indirect medical education adjustment percentage under the Medicare program at 6.5 percent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1004 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
